body: Hahahaahahahahaha this made me laugh hard
I am pretty sure I have seen a live action version of this with her clothes and all

What an absolute alpha bitch. She stole her man back from her worthless slut bitch friend. I was gonna bash on this because I thought Kanda was still gonna get married to the slut, but man, am I glad I was wrong. Best ending ever.

On one hand, what he and the ''friend'' did was wrong because cheating is bad, mmkay? But I can hardly blame the dude, being pent up after 8 years of sexless dating. I mean, they're probs in college or recently graduated, so that means he had to go through puberty and/or his teenage years with so much as a kiss? I'm surprised he didn't cave in sooner.

The slut friend, on the other hand, is inexcusable. You don't do that to your friend and not admit responsibility for it, lol; what kinda backwards ass logic do you need to feel that you didn't do anything wrong and instead feel alright about yourself ''liVinG LiKe i wANt''? I'm glad she found peace between all those dicks, but she shouldn't be called a friend after that, lol.
Man this was f*cking crazy lol. It’d be killer to see this an actual series though
That was pretty weird. I was actually rooting for the light haired chick, since the black haired one seemed to have issues (8 years of dating and no physical contact? Jesus).
